basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Reba Collins Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established to honor the late Reba Collins, considered the world's foremost scholar on Will Rogers. She taught at UCO as a journalism professor and worked as the Director of the University of Central Oklahoma's Public Relations. This scholarship is awarded to a student who shows outstanding achievement and promise in print journalism. Eligibility Requirements Mass Communication, Strategic Communications majors Junior or Senior status in fall semester that scholarship is awarded Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled in at least 12 hours Active in Mass Communication Studies
